item.title: NpcDrops-how do i change the drop rate on teamtorva source?
item.dc:creator: @Artesia Artesia
item.description:
@Artesia wrote:

same pi system brief explanation

#corp beast
8133:50 4113:1

red - The npc’s id
purple - the drop rate its self every kill you have a 1/50 chance of a dro
orange - the item id
blue - the amount of the item being dropped
